ovdesc.p: This application defines the upload reference for which auto batching needs to be triggered.
ID will be in the format BA+Julian Date+5 digit sequence number

desc.p: Free text field to record the description of auto batch definition.
Specifies the upload reference for which auto batching of registers needs to be done based on rules defined in BL.BATCH.CONDITIONS.
Must be a valid Upload reference updated in BL.REGISTER.
Specifies the date when auto batching process was executed.
Specifies the ACTION to be performed on the registers on whether to batch registers based on upload reference (or) rebatch the registers when product is changed.
If upload reference is defined then default value must be BATCH
Seller ID is mandatory when REBATCH option is selected.
Specifies the customer for whom CHANGE PRODUCT (or) REBATCHING action needs to be triggered.
Mandatory when CHANGE.PRODUCT or REBATCH is selected
Specifies whether product change action needs to be triggered for seller based on CHANGE PRODUCT preset conditions defined in BL.BATCH.CONDITIONS
SELLER ID mandatory when CHANGE PRODUCT is defined
